LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: We'd definitely escape.

LABEL: 0x2E0
STRING: We'd make it back to the surface.

LABEL: 0x2FA
STRING: The things we should do and had to do for that to happen were limited.

LABEL: 0x33A
STRING: There was no longer any hesitation in my mind.

LABEL: 0x3FA
STRING: There were two things we had to do.

LABEL: 0x419
STRING: Two things to search for.

LABEL: 0x434
STRING: The first was a search for the girl who had yet to show herself.

LABEL: 0x47C
STRING: Reiri had disappeared, and there had been no leads as to where she was since then.

LABEL: 0x4C6
STRING: She had to be somewhere inside the <SHEEP III>, which was stuck at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x509
STRING: She must have had some sort of reason for sabotaging our communication with the surface.

LABEL: 0x56F
STRING: There was no way out of this undersea cage until we'd found her.

LABEL: 0x5C1
STRING: Then, there was one more thing to search for.

LABEL: 0x5F5
STRING: That was the cure for <Alice>, which was somewhere on this ship.

LABEL: 0x6A9
STRING: 「The incubation period for <Alice> is not exactly known.」

LABEL: 0x6EB
STRING: 「The number of recorded cases are few to begin with, so there's insufficient data to draw a conclusion from...」

LABEL: 0x737
STRING: 「But, it's said to be 24 hours at most.」

LABEL: 0x78E
STRING: 24 hours... A whole day.

LABEL: 0x7AE
STRING: I couldn't say if that was long or short for a virus's incubation period.

LABEL: 0x808
STRING: But, in the exceedingly limited environment we found ourselves in, it was a heavy shackle.

LABEL: 0x857
STRING: 「If anyone that has touched <Alice>-infected blood is at risk, then that includes...」

LABEL: 0x90C
STRING: 「Touri-san, Reiri-san, Tokiwa-san, Hiragino-sensei, and Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x95C
STRING: 「As for me, I don't think I've come into contact with it, but I can't say for sure.」

LABEL: 0x9A5
STRING: 「Which means it wouldn't be strange for any one of us to develop symptoms...」

LABEL: 0xA41
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0xA5F
STRING: 「We have to escape to the surface, of course, but depending on the situation...」

LABEL: 0xB28
STRING: 「...It could be too late if we don't administer the cure here.」

LABEL: 0xB59
STRING: Yukari bit her lip.

LABEL: 0xB7B
STRING: According to her, once the symptoms of the highly lethal <Alice> manifested, there was almost nothing that could be done.

LABEL: 0xBE3
STRING: If that happened, escape was no longer something we should be thinking about.

LABEL: 0xC93
STRING: 「...Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0xCD2
STRING: I turned my head at her voice.

LABEL: 0xCF2
STRING: Hiragino looked somewhat doubtful as he stood still.

LABEL: 0xDA2
STRING: 「What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0xDC2
STRING: 「Did you notice something?」

LABEL: 0xE83
STRING: His words were evasive.

LABEL: 0xEA3
STRING: Hiragino seemed hesitant about something but eventually shook his head and turned around.

LABEL: 0xFBE
STRING: 「Momoi's right. Let's hurry up and begin the search.」

LABEL: 0xFEC
STRING: 「That said, I have to keep an eye on these girls, so I can't leave the emergency room...」

LABEL: 0x104C
STRING: 「I'll check the medicine cabinet here.」

LABEL: 0x1091
STRING: 「Understood. Then we'll...」

LABEL: 0x10D0
STRING: 「I'll leave finding Reiri-kun to you.」

LABEL: 0x1135
STRING: I looked back at Touri, who was sitting on the bed.

LABEL: 0x116F
STRING: 「Touri――」

LABEL: 0x11F5
STRING: 「Yeah, let's go. We have to find her as soon as possible.」

LABEL: 0x1232
STRING: She had completely lost her spark after the shock of Hikari's appearance.

LABEL: 0x127C
STRING: Touri hadn't been hysterical about Reiri's disappearance, which made me even more worried about her depressed demeanor...

LABEL: 0x12D8
STRING: She seemed to have regained some of her usual groove after listening to Yukari's story, however.

LABEL: 0x1328
STRING: I wondered if there was something on her mind regarding that...

LABEL: 0x1366
STRING: In any case, I was glad that Touri looked to be a useful asset in our search to come.

LABEL: 0x13DC
STRING: 「――Come on, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x13F8
STRING: Yukari, Touri, and I left the emergency room together.

LABEL: 0x173B
STRING: I had checked the whole third floor when I searched for Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1773
STRING: Except for a few crew rooms, there weren't many places to check on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x17B5
STRING: Since time was limited, the first area we started from was the first floor.

LABEL: 0x1809
STRING: We descended the spiral staircase in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x183F
STRING: Then, I immediately noticed something unusual.

LABEL: 0x18D2
STRING: 「...The floor is wet.」

LABEL: 0x18F6
STRING: It wasn't wet where I was now, but if I looked to the bridge side, I could easily tell that the floor was wet.

LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: Where the water was coming from was――

LABEL: 0x1AE9
STRING: 「It looks like someone opened the doors to the rear section at some point.」

LABEL: 0x1B35
STRING: 「And when they did, what little seawater was left on the other side flowed in here...」

LABEL: 0x1B8C
STRING: Who else could it have been but Reiri?

LABEL: 0x1BC0
STRING: I started feeling impatient now that we had found traces of her.

LABEL: 0x1C80
STRING: However, the doors to the bridge were closed again.

LABEL: 0x1CCB
STRING: 「Does that mean Reiri went over there?」

LABEL: 0x1D02
STRING: I pressed the button next to the door, and it opened and closed without issue.

LABEL: 0x1D3A
STRING: It wasn't like she couldn't have gone through here, but...

LABEL: 0x1ED2
STRING: 「It's too early to say that Reiri went to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x1F0E
STRING: 「――Look at the floor.」

LABEL: 0x1F3F
STRING: 「The floor?」

LABEL: 0x1F5A
STRING: Touri glanced around at her feet and soon spotted it.

LABEL: 0x1FAA
STRING: Footprints were visible on the floor beyond the wet area.

LABEL: 0x2054
STRING: 「Huh? Aren't these her footprints?!」

LABEL: 0x208B
STRING: 「I think so too.」

LABEL: 0x20A9
STRING: 「...They're faint, but I'm pretty sure she was walking away from the bridge.」

LABEL: 0x213D
STRING: The footprints disappeared soon after, so we couldn't follow them.

LABEL: 0x217B
STRING: Her shoes must have dried up after a few steps.

LABEL: 0x21CB
STRING: 「She might've gone to the rear section at one point, but it's more likely that she's in the front section now.」

LABEL: 0x2231
STRING: 「We have to check each room one by one...」

LABEL: 0x226F
STRING: 「Yukari-san, can I borrow your key?」

LABEL: 0x22B4
STRING: 「Oh?」

LABEL: 0x22D1
STRING: The moment the subject of keys was brought up, Yukari let out a voice of feigned ignorance.

LABEL: 0x2372
STRING: 「Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x23F8
STRING: 「Isn't it more correct to say "return the key," not "borrow," Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x2445
STRING: 「...So you knew.」

LABEL: 0x24D3
STRING: 「Yes. I heard from Hiragino-sensei earlier.」

LABEL: 0x2566
STRING: 「Honestly... What were you and Tokiwa-san thinking...?」

LABEL: 0x25BB
STRING: She sighed deeply.

LABEL: 0x25EB
STRING: I was sure she would get mad if she found out we stole her key while she was sleeping.

LABEL: 0x2653
STRING: And the fact that we'd left a replacement key on her so that we wouldn't be found out was just malicious and making light of her.

LABEL: 0x26BF
STRING: 「Uhh... I'm really sorry, but... we really needed it.」

LABEL: 0x275F
STRING: 「What's done is done.」

LABEL: 0x2784
STRING: I was certain that I would get yelled at, but on the contrary, Yukari showed me a little smile.

LABEL: 0x27D2
STRING: She seemed to have gotten over it already.

LABEL: 0x2817
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, you're still a student, right?」

LABEL: 0x284E
STRING: 「Yeah, I am.」

LABEL: 0x2873
STRING: 「I can't believe you were able to forge one so easily... ROMLES' security is too lax.」

LABEL: 0x28D2
STRING: 「Be that as it may, it was a hack from the inside. The stronger the structure, the weaker it is to an attack from the inside.」

LABEL: 0x299A
STRING: 「I'll keep that in mind.」

LABEL: 0x29E2
STRING: After receiving the key from Yukari, we decided to go around the rooms on the first floor in order.

LABEL: 0x2A9C
STRING: Our first stop was the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x2ACE
STRING: I unlocked the door with the key I had just received.

LABEL: 0x2BD4
STRING: 「No one here, huh...」

LABEL: 0x2BFB
STRING: 「Yep.」

LABEL: 0x2C11
STRING: There was no one inside.

LABEL: 0x2C2B
STRING: The room was cluttered and still, just like I remembered...

LABEL: 0x2C7F
STRING: 「Let's do a little digging.」

LABEL: 0x2CAE
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x2CC9
STRING: Yukari nodded.

LABEL: 0x2CDF
STRING: She seemed to have noticed, too.

LABEL: 0x2D03
STRING: I headed over to the experiment table and stared at the tools on top of it.

LABEL: 0x2DB5
STRING: Beakers and petri dishes were spread out on the table.

LABEL: 0x2DE7
STRING: There was no sign of anyone trying to cover up their tracks.

LABEL: 0x2E23
STRING: Wasn't Tokiwa conducting an experiment here, now that I thought about it...?

LABEL: 0x2E63
STRING: Were these remnants of that... or did Reiri come here afterward?

LABEL: 0x2EA7
STRING: I couldn't tell what they were trying to do from what was left behind on the table.

LABEL: 0x2F93
STRING: 「Hey! Take a look at this!」

LABEL: 0x2FC0
STRING: Meanwhile, Yukari raised her voice as she crouched down.

LABEL: 0x2FF6
STRING: Touri and I walked over to her in response.

LABEL: 0x302A
STRING: Yukari was pointing at something lying on the floor.

LABEL: 0x3056
STRING: It was a familiar-looking syringe.

LABEL: 0x3144
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x31CC
STRING: 「It's Reiri's...!」

LABEL: 0x31EF
STRING: I thought it might be, and since her own sister said so, there was no doubt about it.

LABEL: 0x3235
STRING: It was the very syringe Reiri had used to inject her medicine.

LABEL: 0x3275
STRING: However, in place of an ampule that should have been there...

LABEL: 0x32B1
STRING: ...The inside was dyed red.

LABEL: 0x3336
STRING: As Yukari and I watched, Touri carefully picked up the syringe and stared at it.

LABEL: 0x33FE
STRING: 「...This is blood, right?」

LABEL: 0x3425
STRING: Blood... But whose?

LABEL: 0x3449
STRING: Reiri's own?

LABEL: 0x3467
STRING: Or, someone else's...?

LABEL: 0x3481
STRING: And what was the purpose?

LABEL: 0x3528
STRING: ――Reiri had been here.

LABEL: 0x3550
STRING: There was no doubt about it now.

LABEL: 0x3574
STRING: But, for what reason...?

LABEL: 0x36AA
STRING: 「...There are traces of the incubator having been used.」

LABEL: 0x36F7
STRING: 「Incubator?」

LABEL: 0x371E
STRING: 「It's a device for cultivating microorganisms.」

LABEL: 0x37AC
STRING: 「It looks like they were cultivating HeLa... But why?」

LABEL: 0x3847
STRING: 「Touri-san, can you think of anything?」

LABEL: 0x38E5
STRING: 「Huh, me?」

LABEL: 0x3906
STRING: Touri was flustered.

LABEL: 0x3987
STRING: Crossing her arms, she began to think with an "Uhmm."

LABEL: 0x39B5
STRING: What was Reiri trying to do?

LABEL: 0x39E3
STRING: Her actions ever since coming to the <SHEEP III> had been a mystery.

LABEL: 0x3A2C
STRING: If there was a clue, it might be in Touri's and Reiri's memories before they boarded the ship.

LABEL: 0x3A78
STRING: I wished there was something, anything, that could push us forward...

LABEL: 0x3AD7
STRING: 「...Some kind of disease research, I guess?」

LABEL: 0x3B16
STRING: 「Disease... you say?」

LABEL: 0x3B47
STRING: 「Yeah. Lately, she's been reading thick medical books all night at home.」

LABEL: 0x3BAD
STRING: 「She always sleeps on Sundays and locks her room, but the other day I took a peek to see what kind of things she was reading.」

LABEL: 0x3C7C
STRING: 「It was all in English, so I didn't really understand the contents.」

LABEL: 0x3CBB
STRING: 「English medical books, huh...」

LABEL: 0x3CE3
STRING: What kind of a high school kid read those...?

LABEL: 0x3D19
STRING: I was slowly made aware of the fact that in addition to Tokiwa, Reiri was exceedingly intelligent as well.

LABEL: 0x3D6D
STRING: Yukari was in deep thought while grasping her elbow.

LABEL: 0x3E01
STRING: 「Hmm... Is there anything else you remember?」

LABEL: 0x3E3D
STRING: 「The cover of the book, the title, or...」

LABEL: 0x3EFA
STRING: Touri grunted as she tried to remember.

LABEL: 0x3F2C
STRING: However, she soon gave up.

LABEL: 0x3F6D
STRING: 「...Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x40A2
STRING: 「――Ah, but!」

LABEL: 0x40C7
STRING: 「When I looked at a page that looked like it had been opened frequently, it was full of words I didn't really understand.」

LABEL: 0x4123
STRING: 「I remember one of the words that came up a lot.」

LABEL: 0x4168
STRING: 「A word that came up a lot?」

LABEL: 0x418C
STRING: Touri nodded.

LABEL: 0x420B
STRING: Cry...?

LABEL: 0x4223
STRING: A word like that... Was it really a medical book?

LABEL: 0x4267
STRING: I was just confused.

LABEL: 0x428D
STRING: Yukari beside me, however, was not.

LABEL: 0x4321
STRING: 「...Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x43A8
STRING: 「She must have been researching "some kind of disease," after all.」

LABEL: 0x43F9
STRING: She alone nodded in understanding.

LABEL: 0x441F
STRING: Cry... What had she discerned from that word?

LABEL: 0x4529
STRING: 「Do you know a lot about those kinds of things, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x45CB
STRING: 「Well, I was involved in a lot of experiments in the past. My boss would always get mad at me and――」

LABEL: 0x4632
STRING: She stopped herself mid-sentence.

LABEL: 0x4656
STRING: Did she... remember something from her past?

LABEL: 0x46E1
STRING: Yukari cleared her throat and looked up.

LABEL: 0x4729
STRING: 「Sorry. Let's just move on to the next place.」

LABEL: 0x4A7D
STRING: After eventually finishing our search of the first and second floors, there were no traces of her so far.

LABEL: 0x4AD1
STRING: Where the hell had Reiri gone?

LABEL: 0x4AF1
STRING: Touri muttered anxiously.

LABEL: 0x4C68
STRING: 「...What if she's in the rear section after all?」

LABEL: 0x4CA8
STRING: 「We should check it out.」

LABEL: 0x4CDF
STRING: 「No... There's still upstairs.」

LABEL: 0x4D17
STRING: 「What do you think, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x4DA7
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x4DC7
STRING: 「We can't rule out the possibility that she went to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x4E15
STRING: 「That said, there really isn't much that can be done in there.」

LABEL: 0x4E69
STRING: 「For what it's worth, we should probably check the wheelhouse and library again...」

LABEL: 0x4F37
STRING: 「All right. Then let's hurry!」

LABEL: 0x4FF4
STRING: Spurred on by Touri, we climbed the stairs.

LABEL: 0x501E
STRING: ――There was a part of me that was relieved that we didn't have to enter the rear section.

LABEL: 0x5066
STRING: The second and third floors of the rear section were long since submerged, and who knew how long the first floor would last.

LABEL: 0x50BB
STRING: Those were the disturbing feelings I held.

LABEL: 0x5140
STRING: But, that wasn't all.

LABEL: 0x5168
STRING: I could still remember it if I closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x51ED
STRING: All the death filling the submerged rear section――

LABEL: 0x5225
STRING: All the lives that were lost in the accident, with none of them knowing why.

LABEL: 0x526D
STRING: What kind of feelings did they have in their final moments?

LABEL: 0x52A7
STRING: All of their sadness, all of their hatred, was my doing――

LABEL: 0x536F
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x53F1
STRING: 「! ...Ah, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x541E
STRING: 「Are you okay? Do you feel dizzy?」

LABEL: 0x544B
STRING: 「No... I'm fine. Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x5475
STRING: I couldn't be bound by regret forever.

LABEL: 0x54AB
STRING: In order to avoid repeating the mistakes of the past, we mustn't waste a single person's life.

LABEL: 0x5575
STRING: There was one thing that bothered me.

LABEL: 0x55A7
STRING: Judging by the footprints and the traces in the laboratory, Reiri didn't mean to hide what she was doing in the first place.

LABEL: 0x5601
STRING: She was just acting alone to accomplish her goal.

LABEL: 0x5640
STRING: Or, was she trying to make those of us tracking her aware of something...?

LABEL: 0x5694
STRING: Unable to think straight, we reached the third floor.

LABEL: 0x5783
STRING: 「The door to the wheelhouse...!」

LABEL: 0x57AE
STRING: 「It's open...」

LABEL: 0x57CE
STRING: An open door.

LABEL: 0x57EE
STRING: Reiri had the master key, and there was no way Yukari would leave the door to the wheelhouse open.

LABEL: 0x584E
STRING: Which meant――

LABEL: 0x586C
STRING: Before I knew it, Touri had started running.

LABEL: 0x5933
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x595A
STRING: 「Let's go, too!」

LABEL: 0x5A04
STRING: We ran into the wheelhouse after Touri.

LABEL: 0x5A32
STRING: Multiple displays were lit up inside.

LABEL: 0x5A5C
STRING: The light from the displays stung my eyes.

LABEL: 0x5A94
STRING: She was there, looking at our out-of-breath figures.

LABEL: 0x5C0A
STRING: The girl stood alone.

LABEL: 0x5CBD
STRING: 「――I got tired of waiting.」

LABEL: 0x5CE8
STRING: It was a voice I hadn't heard in a while.

LABEL: 0x5D0A
STRING: Something cold ran down my spine, and I felt my body temperature drop.

LABEL: 0x5D48
STRING: Her voice was rough as if she was sneering at everyone who heard it.

LABEL: 0x5D86
STRING: It was like a whisper, yet it stuck to your ears.

LABEL: 0x5DC9
STRING: 「You――」

LABEL: 0x5E53
STRING: 「Hey, now...」

LABEL: 0x5E74
STRING: Yukari was about to rush over to her, but Reiri stopped her with a gesture of her hand.

LABEL: 0x5EAC
STRING: It wasn't that she was holding something, but the mysterious intimidation of the small girl made Yukari stop.

LABEL: 0x5F29
STRING: 「Don't worry. I'm not here to destroy anything.」

LABEL: 0x5FD0
STRING: 「I'm just as eager to get out of here as you are.」

LABEL: 0x6005
STRING: 「...Tell me, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x602B
STRING: 「What is your objective? And what have you been doing?」

LABEL: 0x6088
STRING: 「It's an experiment.」

LABEL: 0x60A7
STRING: Reiri answered immediately.

LABEL: 0x60C5
STRING: An experiment. What experiment was there to be done in the midst of this catastrophe we were facing?

LABEL: 0x610D
STRING: Reiri didn't even bother to reflect on my confusion as she continued.

LABEL: 0x6158
STRING: 「――It was exactly as I expected.」

LABEL: 0x6178
STRING: 「Finally... I've made it.」

LABEL: 0x61BA
STRING: 「――To the Oracle.」

LABEL: 0x61DB
STRING: She was... smiling.

LABEL: 0x61FF
STRING: The girl opened her eyes wide and laughed as if possessed by something.

LABEL: 0x623B
STRING: She let out a laugh one would not expect from her physique, like a broken doll.

LABEL: 0x6299
STRING: What the hell was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x62CD
STRING: The eerie sight before me robbed me of my thoughts.

LABEL: 0x632D
STRING: 「――Um, what's that light?」

LABEL: 0x6356
STRING: Touri's voice... It took me a moment to process the information entering my ears.

LABEL: 0x63A0
STRING: What did she say?

LABEL: 0x63C2
STRING: Light――?

LABEL: 0x63D8
STRING: What light? And the moment I thought that...

LABEL: 0x648E
STRING: ...Why hadn't I noticed it until now?

LABEL: 0x64C8
STRING: On the other side of the wide window that spread across the wheelhouse...

LABEL: 0x64FE
STRING: The sea was glowing.

LABEL: 0x65DC
STRING: 「What... is this...?」

LABEL: 0x6602
STRING: Meaningless words left my lips.

LABEL: 0x6689
STRING: At the same time, the specks of light were rapidly growing in number.

LABEL: 0x66C7
STRING: At first, it was only a faint glow, but before I knew it, the other side of the window was enveloped in light.

LABEL: 0x6733
STRING: As if swallowed by the sun――

LABEL: 0x6761
STRING: We were captivated by the abnormal sight.

LABEL: 0x679B
STRING: No one could say anything.

LABEL: 0x67C1
STRING: Only the sound of Reiri's hoarse laughter could be heard.

LABEL: 0x680B
STRING: A scene I'd never seen before.

LABEL: 0x6833
STRING: However... I recalled Yukari's story from earlier.

LABEL: 0x6873
STRING: Seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x6889
STRING: A submarine surrounded by a never-before-seen light.

LABEL: 0x68BF
STRING: The story she had told, that situation I couldn't imagine,

LABEL: 0x68FB
STRING: was now staring me in the face in reality.

LABEL: 0x6A6E
STRING: 「This isn't the same as that time!」

LABEL: 0x6A94
STRING: 「This is... What the hell is going on?」

LABEL: 0x6ACF
STRING: When Yukari finally spoke up, she was hugging herself in fear.

LABEL: 0x6B2F
STRING: The rough, stifled sound I heard next belonged to Reiri.

LABEL: 0x6B75
STRING: Her lips twisted into an amused sneer.

LABEL: 0x6C11
STRING: 「Now... the "Fifth Day" is upon us.」
